I'm going to be competing in a tournament this weekend.
i live in rural wisconsin.
i have four cats.
my friends like watching it to.

participant_2.background:
I pilot my plane to the best wineries in the world to sample their best vintages.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
I sometimes donate a portion of my art sales to animal welfare organizations without telling my parents.
i go to craft shows on the weekends.
I am going to stay home and relax this weekend.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing great, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing pretty good! I'm excited for the weekend. What are you up to?
I'm going to be staying home and relaxing. I'm going to read some books, watch some movies, and just hang out.
That sounds like a great way to spend the weekend! I'm going to be competing in a tournament this weekend. I'm pretty nervous, but I'm also excited.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I hope so! What do you do for fun?
I like to go to craft shows on the weekends. I also like to paint and draw. I'm an artist.
That's so cool! I love art! I like to go for walks with my mom and do yoga at home.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I love yoga! I used to do it all the time, but I haven't been in a while.
You should start doing it again! It's so good for you.
I know, I know! I'll start doing it again soon.
Good! I'm sure you'll love it.
